extension_activated.comment: Tracks when the extension is activated

ide.comment: The IDE being used (VS Code, etc.)

toolbar_connected.comment: Tracks when the toolbar in web app dev mode connects to the extension

opened_web_app_workspace.comment: Tracks when the user opens a workspace with web apps

toolbar_auto_setup_started.comment: Tracks when the automatic toolbar setup process is initiated

toolbar_setup_completed.comment: Tracks when the toolbar setup is completed successfully

toolbar_setup_failed.comment: Tracks when the toolbar setup fails

agent_prompt_triggered.comment: Tracks when an agent prompt is triggered by the user

activation_error.comment: Tracks when the extension activation fails

extension_deactivated.comment: Tracks when the extension is deactivated

telemetry_disabled.comment: Tracks when a user disables telemetry collection. This helps understand opt-out rates and is tracked once when the setting changes before telemetry is actually disabled.

telemetry_enabled.comment: Tracks when a user re-enables telemetry collection after previously disabling it.

getting_started_panel_shown.comment: Tracks when the getting started panel is automatically shown to first-time users

getting_started_panel_manual_show.comment: Tracks when a user manually opens the getting started panel via command

interacted_with_getting_started_panel.comment: Tracks when a user interacts with the getting started panel

dismissed_getting_started_panel.comment: Tracks when a user dismisses the getting started panel

clicked_setup_toolbar_in_getting_started.comment: Tracks when a user clicks the setup toolbar button in the getting started panel

clicked_open_docs_in_getting_started_pan.comment: Tracks when a user clicks the open docs button in the getting started panel

post_setup_feedback.comment: Tracks user feedback after toolbar setup completion

type.comment: The type of feedback provided by the user

text.comment: The feedback text provided by the user

email.comment: The email address provided by the user for follow-up (optional)

show_toolbar_update_notification.comment: Tracks when a new toolbar version is available

toolbar_update_notification_auto_update.comment: Tracks when a user clicks the update button in the toolbar update notification

toolbar_update_notification_ignored.comment: Tracks when a user clicks the ignore button in the toolbar update notification

toolbar_update_notification_dismissed.comment: Tracks when a user dismisses the toolbar update notification

toolbar_auto_update_prompt_sent.comment: Tracks when a prompt for auto-updating the toolbar is sent

show_toolbar_integration_notification.comment: Tracks when a user is shown a recommendation to integrate stagewise into their app

toolbar_integration_notification_ignore.comment: Tracks when a user ignores the toolbar integration notification

toolbar_integration_notification_dismiss.comment: Tracks when a user dismisses the toolbar integration notification

authenticate_command_triggered.comment: Tracks when a user initiates the authentication process

logout_command_triggered.comment: Tracks when a user logs out of their account

check_auth_status_command_triggered.comment: Tracks when a user checks their authentication status
